game.name: Subway Surf
game.description: Subway Surf is an addictive Endless running game that takes you in the Subway! Surf past bus, trains and obstacles in the best game Subway Surf. Run through the endless city while as a hoverboard surfer or a jetpack flyer with exciting powerups. Make your way through the bus rush traffic and the subway themes. Begin your surf through the subway by using the swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid obstacles, barriers, bus, taxi, and subway cops.
